20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Sahl bin Abi Hathmah said “The Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) divide Khaibar into two halves. One half was reserved for his emergency and needs, the other half was meant for the Muslims. He divided among them into eighteen portions.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حُكْمِ أَرْضِ خَيْبَرَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Ruling On The Land Of Khaibar
